scripts.watch: NODE_ENV="dev" DEBUG_BUILD="--debug" BUILD_SUFFIX="-dev" npm run watch:all
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:html'
scripts.build:all: npm run build:html & npm run build:css & npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: browserify $DEBUG_BUILD -t [ babelify --loose all ] -t envify -t brfs src/js/bootstrap.js > pub/bundle-${npm_package_version}${BUILD_SUFFIX-$npm_package_version}.js
scripts.build:html: find src -name "*.html" -exec env F={} sh -c 'mkdir -p pub/$(dirname ${F#*/}) ; sed -e "s/__VERSION__/${npm_package_version}${BUILD_SUFFIX}/" < {} > pub/${F#*/}' \;
